column4: Any kind of way of boot using floppy disk and install from an external PXE server?
I know how to make a Grub disk (some little trouble because I'm using grub 2 on Lucid) but grub can boot PXE ?
Mmm, wait, I know!! Grub then PXE then reinstall grub..
I got a problem, I can choose an external server for PXE boot?
hey chelz, I hear about this project some time ago, but I didn't remember it. Thanks
read the page i am linking you to. install # Ubuntu : 9.04 with it
